info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:01PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Phillips, central Garfield, Valley and northwestern McCone Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 801 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles east of Whitewater to 18 miles south of Hinsdale to 7 miles north of Brusett. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Jordan, Opheim, Nashua, Fort Peck, Saco, Duck Creek Rec Area, Hell Creek Rec Area, St. Marie, Brusett, The Pines Rec Area, Tampico, Hinsdale, Fort Peck Marina, Port Of Opheim, Vandalia, Park Grove, Van Norman, The Bentonite Plant and Frenchman Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
